scripts.test-ton: node -e "console.log('Testing TON packages...'); try { const c = require('@ton/crypto'); const t = require('@ton/ton'); console.log('✅ TON packages loaded! Crypto:', !!c.mnemonicNew, 'Ton:', !!t.WalletContractV4); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ Error:', e.message); console.log('❌ Stack:', e.stack); }"
